requestParams.name: logistics_company_name
requestParams.desc: 物流公司（配送出库选填）

requestParams.name: logistics_order_no
requestParams.desc: 物流单号（配送出库选填）

children.name: with_tax_amount
children.desc: 含税总金额（含税成本单价*数量）（元）

requestParams.name: order_type
requestParams.desc: 出库单类型(PSCK=配送出库; BSCK=报损出库;PKCK=盘亏出库;DBCK=调拨出库; YHTHCK=要货退货出库)

requestParams.name: retail_source
requestParams.desc: 零售调用来源（调用方和有赞约定的值）

requestParams.name: source_order_no
requestParams.desc: 关联单据号，如交易出库关联的订单号

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['warehouse_code']="subing2test"
params['source_order_no']="RDB0031903010001"
params['remark']="test"
params['order_type']="PSCK"
params['order_items']="[{"quantity":"5","sku_code":"BM9613846187"}]"
params['creator']="yixing"
params['create_time']="2019-03-01 10:00:00"
params['biz_bill_no']="RCK0031903010001"
params['logistics_order_no']="WL201903010001"
params['logistics_company_name']="顺丰"
params['retail_source']="GUANYIYUN"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.open.stockoutorder.create', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'subing2test', 'source_order_no' => 'RDB0031903010001', 'remark' => 'test', 'order_type' => 'PSCK', 'order_items' => '[{"quantity":"5","sku_code":"BM9613846187"}]', 'creator' => 'yixing', 'create_time' => '2019-03-01 10:00:00', 'biz_bill_no' => 'RCK0031903010001', 'logistics_order_no' => 'WL201903010001', 'logistics_company_name' => '顺丰', 'retail_source' => 'GUANYIYUN', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';

errorCodes.solution: 一般是入参有问题，确认仓库编码等是否正确
